name: Early Sunrise Week
description: One week of before-dawn starts to build quiet consistency.
intent: Reinforce habits that make race season feel calm.
rules: Complete at least three runs before 7am. Keep it simple and steady.

name: Sharpen the Build
description: Short focus block on intentional quality sessions.
intent: Support race specificity without adding pressure.
rules: Pick two quality sessions you can execute cleanly. No extra volume.
